title: Daybloom Seeds
summaries: Daybloom Seeds are a type of seed that can be obtained from harvesting Dayblooms while they are blooming or using the Staff of Regrowth on naturally grown Dayblooms while they are fully grown. Daybloom will only bloom during daytime, showing off a sunflower-like head. Each plant will drop 1–3 Daybloom Seeds when harvested while blooming.

Daybloom Seeds can be placed on pure and Hallowed grass (including Mowed grass and Mowed Hallowed grass), empty Clay Pots, or any types of Planter Boxes, and will grow into harvestable Dayblooms. They will grow anywhere, not just in direct sunlight on the Surface, but will only yield seeds when blooming.
